39266.「<%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>が できるのを\n だれでもＯＫにしま:
Do you want to allow anyone to do
<%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>?<yesno><break>

39267.「<%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>が できるのを\n 自分だけにしますか:
Do you want only you to be able to
<%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>?<yesno><break>

39268.「他にも 権限の設定をしますか？\n<break>: Do you want to set any other permissions?<break>

39269.「変更したい項目を お選びください。\n<break>: Select the item you want to change...<break>

39270.「権限設定を変更したい人を お選びください。\n<break>:
Select the person you want to change the
permissions for...<break>

39271.「かしこまりました。\n これより 『<%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>』:
Yes, sir... From now on, anyone can use
"<%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>"... You never know who
might show up, so please be careful...<bw_break>

39272.「かしこまりました。これより\n 『<%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>』が:
Yes, sir. From now on, you will be the only
one who can do <%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>...<bw_break>

39273.「かしこまりました。これより\n 『<%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>』は:
Yes, sir. From now on, <%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>
will only be available to a limited number of
specified people...<bw_break>

39274.「この家の 権限設定を変更できます。\n 変更したい項目を お選びください。\n:
You can change the permission settings for
this house... Select the items you wish to
change...<break>

39275.「あら……？ フレンドリストには\n どなたも 登録されていないようです。\n<: Oh...? There's no one on your friends list...<bw_break>

39276.「あら。あなたは チームに\n 所属されていないようですね。\n<bw_brea: Oh. You don't seem to belong to a team...<bw_break>

39277.「あら……？\n あなたのチームには あなた以外のメンバーが\n いらっしゃらな:
Oh...? It seems you're the only other member
of your team.<bw_break>

41524.「申し訳ありませんが\n 設定できませんでした。\n もう一度 ご指示ください。:
I'm sorry, I can't set it up. Please try
again.

46750.「家具機能の利用は フレンドにのみ\n 設定することができます。\n<br>\n:
The furniture feature can only be set up for
friends. Please select the items you want to
change...<break>

49975.「フレンドの情報を 取得できませんでした。\n 時間を置いて もう一度 お試しく:
Unable to retrieve friend information...
Please give it some time and try again...<bw_break>

49976.「一部のフレンドの情報を 取得できませんでした。\n<bw_break>:
I can't get the information of some of my
friends...<bw_break>

50289.「『家への出入り』を『だれでもＯＫ』にしたので\n この家を ウェルカムハウスに:
Now that we've set access to the house to "open to all," we can make this house a welcome home... Do you know what a welcome
house is?

50290.「では この家を\n ウェルカムハウスに 設定しますか？\n<yesno><br:
So, would you like to set up this house as a
welcome home?<yesno><break>

50291.「はい。この家を\n ウェルカムハウスに 設定しました。\n<bw_break>:
Yes, sir. We'll set up this house as a
welcome home...<bw_break>

50292.「では 説明します。ウェルカムハウスに\n 設定すると たくさんの人が この家を:
Let me explain. If we set it up as a welcome house, a lot of people might find this house and come to visit. The welcome house can also
be accessed from the sign, and balloons will be placed on the sign outside the house so that other people can easily find it.
However, there may be a lot of people in the house, so please be careful when setting permissions on furniture...

52172.「現在 この家は ウェルカムハウスに\n 設定されています。\n ウェルカムハウ:
This house is currently set up as a welcome
home... Would you like to stop setting the
house as a welcome home?<yesno><break>

53128.「ウェルカムハウス設定を やめました。\n 『誰かの家へ』の検索対象から はずれ:
I've stopped setting up welcome homes. You're
no longer being searched for "somebody's
home."

71874.「<%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>が できるのを\n <%sL_CATE:
Would you like <%sL_CATEGORY> to be able to
<%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>?<yesno><break>

71875.「かしこまりました。これより\n 『<%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>』が:
Okay... From now on, "<%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>"
will be <%sL_CATEGORY>...<bw_break>

113286.「お掃除や お茶を飲んでいる姿などの\n <%sL_SELECTED_CLASS:
Would you like <%sL_CATEGORY> to be able to
see <%sL_SELECTED_CLASS> of you cleaning,
drinking tea, etc.?<yesno><break>

113287.「かしこまりました。これより\n 『<%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>』が:
Okay... From now on, <%sL_SELECTED_CLASS>
will be seen in <%sL_CATEGORY>...<bw_break>

233004.「この家の 権限設定を変更できます。\n 現在のプレイ環境では 一部の権限しか\:
I'd like to change the permissions on this house. Please note that the current play environment only allows you to change some of
the permissions...

237194.「『マイタウンへの出入り』を『だれでもＯＫ』に\n したので ウェルカムハウスに:
Now that I've set "Access to My Town" to
"Open to All," I can set the Welcome House
to... Do you know what a Welcome House is?<yesno><break>

237196.「では このマイタウンを\n ウェルカムハウスに 設定しますか？\n<yesno:
So, do you want to set up this My Town as a
welcome house?<yesno><break>

237198.「現在 ウェルカムハウスの\n 設定をしている家は 設定をやめて\n 検索対象か:
If a house is currently set up as a welcome
home, we'll stop setting it up and remove it
from the search.<yesno><break>

237200.「ウェルカムハウス設定を やめました。\n 『他の人のタウンへ』と『他の人の家へ:
I've stopped setting up welcome houses. No
longer searchable by "other people's towns"
and "other people's homes."

237202.「これより『マイタウンへの出入り』と\n 『家への出入り』が できるのは\n <:
From now on, the only place you can enter and
leave My Town and enter and leave your house
is <%sL_CATEGORY>...

237204.「このマイタウンの 権限設定を変更できます。\n 現在のプレイ環境では 一部の権:
How do I change the permissions on this MyTown... Please note that you can only change some of the permissions in the current
play...

237206.「マイタウン全体の 権限設定を変更します。\n 変更したい項目を お選びください:
Change permission settings for MyTown as a
whole... Select the item you want to
change...<break>

237208.「では 説明します。\n ウェルカムハウスは 外側から来る\n 他の人の訪問を:
Let me explain. A welcome house is a place that welcomes visitors from the outside... If you make one of the houses in your town a
Welcome House, you might get a lot of visitors... To get to a house you've set up as a Welcome House, select a theme from the
menu on the door of each house, or from outside of My Town, you can jump to it from Listea, the land manager, or from the support
staff standing at the entrance of each residential village. If you set up a welcome house, balloons will be placed on the sign
outside your house so that other people can easily see you... When I set up a Welcome House, the "Access to My Town" setting is
automatically set to "Anyone can enter"... Please be careful when setting permissions on furniture and garden tools...

248020.「かしこまりました。これより\n 『マイタウンの出入り』と『家の出入り』は\n:
Yes, sir... From now on, anyone can enter and leave My Town and enter and leave my house... We don't know what kind of people will come,
so please be careful...

248021.「はい。この家を\n <%sL_CATEGORY> の\n ウェルカムハウスに:
Yes. I've set this house as a welcome home
for <%sL_CATEGORY>... "Anyone can enter and
leave My Town..."<bw_break>
